contextMenuTitle.description: Title of the context menu item

instanceUrlHint.message: Important: Enter the URL with https:// at the beginning and a / at the end. Example: https://fediverse.example/
instanceUrlHint.description: Hint for the instance URL input field

urlHttpsError.description: Status message when URL is missing https://

urlSlashError.description: Status message when URL is missing /

urlHostnameOk.description: Status message when the domain name is recognized

urlHostnameError.message: Missing domain name between https:// and /

languageSelectLabel.description: Label for the language select field

optionSystem.description: Option for using the system language

urlErrorMessage.message: Error: The URL must start with https://, end with /, and have something in between.
urlErrorMessage.description: Error message when the URL is invalid

settingsSaved.description: Message displayed when settings are saved
